message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.
I'm interested in the product, but $10000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $6000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand that $10000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $6000. I can meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer, so I'm willing to sell it to you for $8000. This is my final offer, but I'm willing to negotiate further if you're willing to meet me at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $7200 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $8000 and $7200, so I'm offering it to you for $7600. This is my best offer, and I'm not sure I can go any lower.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $7600 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $7000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to the bottom line, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $7000 and $7600, so I'm offering it to you for $7300. This is my final offer, and I'm not sure I can go any lower.
I'm willing to meet you halfway between $7300 and $7000, but I think we can do better than that. I'm willing to pay $7150 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting a bit too close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $7150 and $7300, so I'm offering it to you for $7225. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I'm willing to meet you halfway between $7225 and $7150, but I think we can do even better. I'm willing to pay $7167.50 for the product. This is my final offer.
